thread.title: Clifton High School athlets enter HOF
thread.title_full: Clifton High School athlets enter HOF

title: Clifton High School athlets enter HOF
text:
Clifton High School athlets enter HOF October 16, 2015 Last updated: Friday, October 16, 2015, 12:31 AM Clifton Journal Print 
The Clifton Athletic Hall of Fame held their induction ceremony last week. Pictured here are 2015 Clifton High School Athletic Hall of Fame inductees Michael Lombardo (Class of 1991), Mickey Soccol (Class of 1989), Emily Urciuoli (Class of 2010), Ken Kurnath (Class of 1950), Corey Bleaken (Class of 2006), Pete Lehr (Class of 1958) and Joe Hathaway (Class of 2005). Also inducted but not pictured was the 2008 girls track and field team, the 2001 CHS ice hockey team, the 1986 CHS wrestling team and Kevin Szott (Class of 1981).
